text: mariyu evaraite allah nu mariyu ayana pravaktalanu visvasistaro, alanti vare satyasandhulaina (visvasulu). Mariyu vare tama prabhuvu vadda amara virulu. Variki vari pratiphalam mariyu jyoti labhistayi. Kani evaraite satyanni tiraskaristaro mariyu ma ayatulanu abad'dhalani antaro, alanti varu tappaka bhagabhaga mande narakagni vasulavutaru
